name: Blackhawk Striker 2 Saved Game
summary: File created by Blackhawk Striker 2, an arcade helicopter game developed by WildTangent in which the user pilots a 365 Assault Helicopter Co and needs to rapidly fuel it up; contains saved game data which is accessed and used so that the user can continue their flying mission from where they left off without losing any saved progress.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
